stack:script.stack:eval:
cert=`mktemp -dq /etc/security/ca/new-certs/cert.XXXXXX`
( cd /etc/security/ca; \ /usr/bin/openssl req -new -nodes -config ca.cfg \ -keyout $cert/key \ -subj "\ /C=&settings.ssl.country;/\ ST=&settings.ssl.state;/\ L=&settings.ssl.locality;/\ O=&settings.ssl.organization;/\ OU=&Kickstart_PrivateHostname;/\ CN=&hostname;.&Kickstart_PrivateDNSDomain;" \ > $cert/csr 2>/dev/null )
echo "<stack:file stack:name='/etc/pki/tls/private/localhost.key' stack:perms='0400'>" cat $cert/key echo "</stack:file>"
( cd /etc/security/ca; \ /usr/bin/openssl x509 -req -days 1000 \ -CA ca.crt -CAkey ca.key -CAserial ca.serial \ < $cert/csr \ > $cert/crt 2>/dev/null )
echo "<stack:file stack:name='/etc/pki/tls/certs/localhost.crt' stack:perms='0444'>" cat $cert/crt echo "</stack:file>" rm -rf $cert
